Description: Similar to [env_shooter](../env_shooter), except that this can only fire human gibs.

KeyDescriptions.keyDescription: Set name of {{ entname }} so other entities can trigger it to start shooting gibs. Every trigger use-type works uniformly. Can't be triggered when gibs shooting is in progress. Can be kill-targeted but gibs stay.

Notes: If your delay between shots is 0, the game may increase it notably; 0.01 works, though.
The gibs also bounce off players.
Gibs do not get stuck in each other.
